answers.author: Maxwell Moline
answers.text:
Hello Janice,
Here is the link to the description of ICMA's Voluntary Credentialing Program.
http://icma.org/en/icma/members/credentialing
I hope this helps to answer your question. Please let us know if you need more information or help.
Thank you,
Max Moline
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA

author: Janice White (Fisher)
text:
Please provide information about ICMA credentialing.  I am interested in working local government in Panama or other Latin America municipalities.  Thank you.
Respectfully,
J. White Fisher
j3whitefisher@yahoo.com
title: Credentialing and employment with overseas local government
